page_content:
CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY REPORT 2020
Cherry Street  
Revitalization Project
IN 2020, PEOPLE’S UNITED INVESTED IN A REVITALIZATION PROJECT  
ON CHERRY STREET IN BRIDGEPORT, CT, AS PART OF ITS COMMUNITY- REINVESTMENT PROGRAM.
The	Cherry 	Street 	renovation 	combined 	a	variety 	of	funding 	sources —including 	private 	and		
public —to	turn	a	vacant 	industrial 	site	into	new	affordable 	housing, 	helping 	to	revitalize 	a	crucial 	
area	in	downtown 	Bridgeport. 	The People’s United investment in affordable tax credits is part  
of a portfolio of more than $650 million in critical economic investments.
COMMUNITY PARTNERSHIP MATTERS
28 29
